sentences.sentence: I don't have proper equipment to fully test this alternator.
sentences.translation: 我没有适当的设备，以充分测试此发电机。

sentences.sentence: Without these super high quality magnets, this alternator would not be nearly as effective.
sentences.translation: 如果没有这些超级优质磁铁，这个发电机几乎不会有效。

sentences.sentence: As with all our other alternator "experiments"... it is truly the magnets which make it possible!
sentences.translation: 至于我们所有其他发电机“实验”…它是真正的磁铁，使人们有可能！
